alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 1:58PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Fremont County through 245 PM MDT... At 158 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hudson to 7 miles northeast of South Pass City. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sand Draw and Sweetwater Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Riverton.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East
